item.title: Road Trip WA
item.author: @huatuostudio
item.description: 2016 Easter. Another year and another Easter, time goes so fast. Three of us has decided to take a road trip to the Western Australia’s Southern Forest Region. We all knew the region pretty well so the trip was roughly planned and the accommodation was booked a few days before the trip. The Itinerary Itinerary Map Day 1 Leave Perth Rest at Bunbury (1.5hrs), change driver Take the National Route 1 from Bunbury to Walpole, rest at Bridgetown and Manjimup
